text: Alfons Pawelczyk (born 26 February 1933) is a German politician. He is a member of the Social Democratic Party. He was a Hamburg state minister of the Interior and second mayor in Hamburg. Pawelczyk was lieutenant colonel of the German federal armed forces and member of the German federal parliament from 1969 to 1980. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany
title: Alfons Pawelczyk
